long_description: One of the most popular Kershaw designs, the slim and durable Kershaw Leek knife opens smoothly with one hand and cuts through your outdoor slicing and piercing tasks with ease. Forged from durable Sandvik 14C26N stainless steel, the modified drop-point blade sharpens to a razor edge. SpeedSafe assisted-opening mechanism allows you to open the knife with one hand; steel liner locks the blade into the open position for secure use. Light and tough 6060-T6 anodized aluminum handle contours comfortably to your hand. The Kershaw Leek knife includes a reversible pocket clip for tip-up or tip-down carrying.
short_description: One of the most popular Kershaw designs, the slim and durable Kershaw Leek knife opens smoothly with one hand and cuts through your outdoor slicing and piercing tasks with ease.
